content.rendered:
learn

Contact us

Fill out the form below

Are you missing any information?

Find without waiting for your answer:

  • About the training catalogue: themes, places, dates, pre-requisites…
  • Concerning the financing tracks: grants, quotations…
  • Concerning everything else: in the Frequently Asked Questions!

We have tried to indicate on this site absolutely everything we know you may need. These pages are updated very regularly. Should you still not find the answers to your questions on these pages, you can send us your request:

Thank you for your message

Please note that we are receiving a large number of e-mails: we try to reply to each one as soon as possible and this is usually done within 10 days. We encourage you to check first that your answer is not in one of the pages mentionned above.

The Bioforce team

In accordance with European Regulation 2016/679, known as the “General Regulation on Data Protection”, the data collected is kept for a period of up to 36 months after the last unanswered request from you. This data is not sold to third parties. Your data is hosted by our email (Mailjet.com) and SaaS (Alcuin.com) providers. We make every effort to ensure the security of your data. You have the right to access, modify, rectify and delete data concerning you. To exercise this right, please contact our data protection officer: Bioforce – Communication Department, 41 avenue du 8 mai 1945, 69694 Vénissieux Cedex – FRANCE – or by e-mail using our contact forms above.
